name: Fast Food Takeaway Drift
description: This game was created for the weekly game jam 197 themed around delivery. Fast Food Takeaway Drift is a frantic driving game where the player must quickly navigate throughout a colourful cityscape with an 80s vaporwave aesthetic. The player must quickly deliver as many pizzas as possible before time runs out by driving to the red and green pizza markers on the map to pickup and deliver them, but be careful not to hit anyone as you rush to deliver the pizza as fast as possible. Hitting people will decrease your time but if your able to make a delivery quickly you'll be rewarded with bonus time. How many delivery's can you make before you run out of time?
